greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: the n-th row consists of the coefficients in the expansion of Sum_{j=0..n} A123162(n,j)*x^j*(1 - x)^(n - j).
formula: Row n = coefficients in the expansion of (1 - x)^n + x*((1 - 2*sqrt((1 - x)*x))^n*(1 - x + sqrt((1 - x)*x)) - (1 - x - sqrt((1 - x)*x))*(1 + 2*sqrt((1 - x)*x))^n)/ (2*sqrt((1 - x)*x)*(2*x - 1)).
example: ... reformatted and extended. - _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 10 2018
mathematica: v = Table[CoefficientList[Sum[a[[n + 1]][[m + 1]]*x^ m*(1 - x)^(n - m), {m, 0, n}], x], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[v]
program: (Maxima) A123162(n, k) := if n = 0 and k = 0 or k = 0 then 1 else binomial(2*n - 1, 2*k - 1)$
T(n, k) := ratcoef(P(x, n), x, k)$
tabf(nn) := for n:0 thru nn do print(makelist(T(n, k), k, 0, hipow(P(x, n), x)))$ /* _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 10 2018 */
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Oct 04 2006
